meanings.definition: A type of betting pool in which participants predict the outcome of sporting events.
meanings.sent1: In the quinielas, people guess which team will win the game.
meanings.sent2: She joined the quinielas at work to guess the winners of the matches.
meanings.sent3: The quinielas results were so close, it felt like a thrilling race.
meanings.sent4: His accurate quinielas predictions made him the champion of the betting pool.
meanings.sent5: Participating in the quinielas added excitement to watching sports events.

meanings.definition: A form of lottery in which players select a set of numbers to match those drawn.
meanings.sent1: Every week, she buys a ticket for the quinielas hoping to win.
meanings.sent2: The quinielas draw was about to start, and everyone held their tickets tightly.
meanings.sent3: His lucky charm for the quinielas was a worn-out penny he found on the street.
meanings.sent4: The quinielas numbers aligned perfectly with her chosen ones, making her jump with joy.
meanings.sent5: The excitement of checking the quinielas results was overwhelming for the players.
